1. This is my GraphQL Schema.

```graphql
type Query {
  book: Book!
}

  id: ID!
  name: String!
  content: String!
}
```

2. This is the invoked query

```graphql

  id
  name
  content
}
```

3. I use these permissions

```ts

  Query: {
    book: allow,
  },
  Book: {
    content: deny,
  },
})
```

4. This is the error I see

```ts
<insert error here>
```
